name: PilgriMush
description:
Made during Global game jam 2023 FGJ Kymenlaakso

HOW TO PLAY

Start the game by clicking on the Spore icon at the bottom left of the screen. Then use the spore to pollinate any tree in the forest with mushrooms.

The pollinated trees will soon start reproducing!

The goal of the game is to reach the Mushroom Land at the bottom right corner of the map. When a tree has been pollinated within the Mushroom Land
the gane has been won!

Click on any pollinated tree to unleash the mushroom's Mycelium Roots. Click on any other pollinated tree to connect them! Keep connecting trees to
create a vast network of mushrooms under the trees, helping the trees share the nutrients they need to expand through the dry fields. You can see

the amount of nutrients each tree has from the small number underneath it.

Be careful! You don't want your trees to run out of nutrients, or else they will soon die!

Note: If you restart the game from the pause menu, you need to pause and unpause the game again for it to work properly.

CONTROLS:

Hold right click to scroll through the map

Escape key to pause

Left click to plant spores and unleash Mycelium.
